name: There is no title! (TINT 1.5)
description:
The aliens are attacking! Quick, we must protect the train! Grab your weapons, and let's hope they'll stop coming eventually...



TINT is an arcade game set on a train, where your objective is to.. well.. defend the train from one-eyed flying alien creatures. With only a sword, a gun, and only one life, this game is really a "Dark souls but with trains".
Important: You're safe inside the train. Fall through the roof by holding down arrow.


Controls:

Move - Left arrow, right arrow
Jump - Up arrow
Slam down / jump through train roof - Down arrow
Shoot / Charge gun - X
Deflect fireballs / use sword - Z
R - Restart

Current version: TINT v1.5
